channel.title: Runescape
channel.description:
o know this maybe off topic but anyways
pking is coming back
So, in 2008, we will be bringing you special 'PvP worlds', where you can fight other players almost anywhere! In addition to all the usual content you might expect to find in RuneScape, they will also include:
* Optional sign-up – choose between PvP danger or stick to ordinary play by simply switching worlds. * High danger with items dropped on death. * High rewards for kills. To avoid any RWT issues the reward for a successful PK will be generated by the game, similar to when you kill a monster at the moment. We're creating generous drop tables based on factors like your levels and the impressiveness of the kill. * These drop tables will include "PvP world specific" items like XP-modifying gear, lvl 70+ equipment and new, glorious, short-term but hard hitting gear. These will once again make PKing a viable source of income. * PvP across 99% of the world, including the old Wilderness. * Attack any player within a certain level of your own. Level range depends on the area, similar to the old Wilderness levels. * ...And all sorts of other twists on interesting content... Just think of the possibilities when you can PK anywhere!

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @wc4evandeva wc4evandeva
item.description:
@wc4evandeva wrote:

They did no they lost many customers but they took the hit to make the game look better, They knew it would still have players but not nearly teh amount it used to.
Trust Me
After all the money they lost…
Its not coming back lol

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

wc4evandeva:

MY ASS Pking Is Never Coming Back Jagex Has Stated this many times…I’ve Talked to Jagex Admins, and they said all there making is no PvP minigames like bountyhunter…

agreed they said pk wont come back because it bring RWT which they also said if RWT doesnt stop runescape will have to stop because people are making companys around this.

Read full topic

item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

o know this maybe off topic but anyways

pking is coming back

So, in 2008, we will be bringing you special ‘PvP worlds’, where you can fight other players almost anywhere! In addition to all the usual content you might expect to find in RuneScape, they will also include:

* Optional sign-up – choose between PvP danger or stick to ordinary play by simply switching worlds.
* High danger with items dropped on death.
* High rewards for kills. To avoid any RWT issues the reward for a successful PK will be generated by the game, similar to    when you kill a monster at the moment. We're creating generous drop tables based on factors like your levels and the impressiveness of the kill.
* These drop tables will include "PvP world specific" items like XP-modifying gear, lvl 70+ equipment and new, glorious, short-term but hard hitting gear. These will once again make PKing a viable source of income.
* PvP across 99% of the world, including the old Wilderness.
* Attack any player within a certain level of your own. Level range depends on the area, similar to the old Wilderness levels.
* ...And all sorts of other twists on interesting content... Just think of the possibilities when you can PK anywhere!
